section.p: The gathering of a occurence assessment information( non surgical procedure/s that were performed during the Surgical process).

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] categoryGrouping with data type Code
This is the name of the category in which this occurrence may be grouped. It should be entered for all occurrences and will be used by Surgery Central Office for reporting needs. Required for National reporting

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
Contains the date and time of the occurrence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] occurrenceId with data type Id
Unique Identifier for the Occurrence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] result, where its type is Occurrence Assessment Result
The response result to an non surgical occurrence assessment question.

Contains exactly one [1..1] categoryGrouping with data type Code
This is the name of the category in which this occurrence may be grouped. It should be entered for all occurrences and will be used by Surgery Central Office for reporting needs. Required for National reporting

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
Contains the date and time of the occurrence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] occurrenceId with data type Id
Unique Identifier for the Occurrence.

Contains exactly one [1..1] result, where its type is Occurrence Assessment Result
The response result to an non surgical occurrence assessment question.
